this_tab_matching_logins_header.description: Header for the section displaying matching login items

this_tab_matching_logins_header_no_login.description: Message displayed when no login items match the current tab

this_tab_all_logins_header.description: Header for the section displaying all login items

this_tab_search_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input showing the number of available items

this_tab_more_details.description: Button label to view more details about a login item

this_tab_more_forget_password.description: Button label to forget the saved password for a login item

this_tab_more_forget_payment_card.description: Button label to forget the saved payment card

this_tab_more_uris.description: Label for displaying associated website URLs of a login item

this_tab_copy_to_clipboard.description: Button label to copy data to the clipboard

this_tab_no_search_results.message: No search results. Please try again.
this_tab_no_search_results.description: Message displayed when no search results are found

this_tab_autofill_success.description: Message displayed when autofill operation is successful

this_tab_autofill_no_password.message: Username autofilled but no password found
this_tab_autofill_no_password.description: Message displayed when no password is found for autofill

this_tab_autofill_fetch_password.message: Username autofilled. Fetch password from device to complete.
this_tab_autofill_fetch_password.description: Message displayed when username is autofilled for a Highly Secret item that requires fetching password from device

this_tab_autofill_no_username_and_passwo.message: No username and password found. Autofill not possible.
this_tab_autofill_no_username_and_passwo.description: Message displayed when no username and password are found for autofill

this_tab_can_t_autofill.message: Browser Extension can't autofill. Copy the Item details and paste them manually.
this_tab_can_t_autofill.description: Message shown when autofill isn't possible, suggesting manual copy-paste

this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2.message: Browser Extension can't autofill. Fetch Item details and paste them manually.
this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2.description: Message shown when autofill isn't possible, suggesting fetching details manually

this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2_failed.message: Browser Extension canâ€™t autofill the form.
this_tab_can_t_autofill_t2_failed.description: Message displayed when autofill operation fails completely

this_tab_can_t_find_inputs.message: No input field found. Can't autofill Item details.
this_tab_can_t_find_inputs.description: Message shown when input fields for autofill can't be found

this_tab_copy_password.description: Button label to copy the password to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_password.description: Button label to fetch the password from the mobile app

this_tab_copy_username.description: Button label to copy the username to the clipboard

this_tab_copy_text.description: Button label to copy text from a secure note to the clipboard

this_tab_copy_name.description: Button label to copy the name of an item to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_text.description: Button label to fetch the text from the mobile app

this_tab_copy_card_number.description: Button label to copy the card number to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_card_number.description: Button label to fetch the card number from the mobile app

this_tab_copy_card_security_code.description: Button label to copy the security code to the clipboard

this_tab_fetch_card_security_code.description: Button label to fetch the security code from the mobile app

this_tab_more_actions.description: Label for a dropdown or menu containing additional actions

this_tab_tag_info_text.description: Information text displaying the number of items with a specific tag

this_tab_clear_tag_filter.description: Button label to clear the selected tag filter

this_tab_update_available.message: A new version of the extension is available!
this_tab_update_available.description: Notification message when a new extension update is available

this_tab_update_button.description: Button label to update the extension

this_tab_update_button_title.message: Update the extension to the latest version

this_tab_update_manual_required.message: Please update the extension manually from your browser's extension settings
this_tab_update_manual_required.description: Error message when automatic update is not available

this_tab_autofill_fetch_card_data.message: Cardholder name autofilled. Fetch card details from device to complete.
this_tab_autofill_fetch_card_data.description: Message displayed when cardholder name is autofilled for a Highly Secret item that requires fetching card data from device

this_tab_autofill_no_card_data_available.message: Only cardholder name was available for autofill
this_tab_autofill_no_card_data_available.description: Message displayed when only cardholder name was autofilled because no encrypted card data exists

this_tab_autofill_year_not_available.message: The expiry year is not available in the form options
this_tab_autofill_year_not_available.description: Message displayed when the card expiry year doesn't match any available option in the form's year dropdown

this_tab_autofill_month_not_available.message: The expiry month is not available in the form options
this_tab_autofill_month_not_available.description: Message displayed when the card expiry month doesn't match any available option in the form's month dropdown

this_tab_autofill_expiration_date_not_av.message: The expiry date is not available in the form options
this_tab_autofill_expiration_date_not_av.description: Message displayed when the card expiry date doesn't match any available option in the form's dropdown
